Title: Requires license plates for certain bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters and requires a person be eighteen years of age to operate or purchase bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters
Summary: Requires license plates for certain bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters; requires a person be eighteen years of age to operate or purchase bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters.
LawCode: Amd Art 34 Art Head, Art 34-D Art Head, §§1242 & 1282, add §§1244, 1245, 1290 & 1291, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring license plates for certain bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters and requiring a person be eighteen years of age to operate or purchase bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters
